name: lyricnote-monorepo
description: 多端应用框架 - Multi-platform Application Framework

scripts.build: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:backend && pnpm build:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:mobile && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.devdb:generate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.devdb:push: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx drizzle-kit push
scripts.devdb:migrate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.devdb:seed: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npm run db:seed
scripts.devdb:studio: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx drizzle-kit studio --port 5555
scripts.devdb:introspect: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx drizzle-kit introspect
scripts.prodb:generate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.prodb:push: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx drizzle-kit push
scripts.prodb:migrate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.prodb:seed: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npm run db:seed
scripts.prodb:studio: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx drizzle-kit studio --port 5556
scripts.prodb:introspect: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx drizzle-kit introspect
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
